name: avi
description: Avi Vantage ADC. An example for this package's usage can be found at https://github.com/dcos/examples/tree/master/avi
preInstallNotes: This DC/OS service is currently in preview. We recommend a minimum of 4 CPUs/12 GB of RAM available for the Avi Controller Service; and 1 CPU/2 GB RAM for Avi ServiceEngine.
postInstallNotes:
Avi DCOS Service has been successfully installed!
See http://kb.avinetworks.com for documentation.
postUninstallNotes:
Avi DCOS Service has been uninstalled and will no longer run.
See http://kb.avinetworks.com/system-cleanup-following-uninstall-from-mesos-dcos/ on how to cleanup persisted state
